title: The Gary Peacock Trio Balances Introspection And Drive In 'Now This'
teaser: Bassist Gary Peacock, pianist Marc Copland and drummer Joey Baron bring an airy, elastic swing to their new album, Now This. Critic Kevin Whitehead says the players pull the melodies together well.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
